txt.en: 'Like a chicken, headless! That's what the Haradrim have become, thanks to my strategy and your hard work. They'll be confounded and demoralized now, I assure you.\n\n'Ah! What am I doing here, [placeholder]? I should be up north, by Forlong's side. I hope only that my absence does not jeopardize the war.'
Dagor can be found in Arnach, near the keep.\n\nYou should return to Dagor and tell him how you have bested a number of their leaders.
Haradrim Captains can be found, especially in their camps, east and south of Arnach.\n\nYou should defeat captains of the Haradrim to compromise their leadership and organization.

'Like a chicken, headless! That's what the Haradrim have become, thanks to my strategy and your hard work. They'll be confounded and demoralized now, I assure you.\n\n'Ah! What am I doing here, [placeholder]? I should be up north, by Forlong's side. I hope only that my absence does not jeopardize the war.'

'Now, thinking as a captain and tactician, I know that my greatest foe must be... the enemy captain! Among the Haradrim who trespass in Lossarnach, there will be soldiers and there will be leaders.

'Without captains, the foe is confused and scattered, and we prevail!

'You seem formidable in combat, good [placeholder]. And you are free to go while duty keeps me here. Would you enact my bold stratagem?'
Dagor has a bold strategem for throwing the Haradrim invaders into disarray.
Dagor: A Blow to the Head
